rukus.text: 72|20|Ni shuo:“Wo zhi qidao wo de zhu, wo bu yi renhe wu pei ta.”
72|21|Ni shuo:“Wo buneng wei nimen zhuchi huo fu.”
72|22|Ni shuo:“Renhe ren buneng baohu wo bu shou an la de chengfa; chu an la wai, wo jue buneng faxian renhe binan suo.
72|23|Wo zhi neng chuanda cong an la jiang shi de tongzhi he shiming. Shei weikang an la he shizhe, shei bi shou huo yu de xingfa, erqie yong ju qizhong.
72|24|Dai tamen kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa de shihou, tamen jiu zhidao shei shi geng gua zhu de.”
72|25|Ni shuo:“Wo bu zhidao nimen bei jinggao de xingfa shi linjin de ne? Haishi wo de zhujiang wei ta guiding yige qixian ne?
72|26|Ta shi quanzhi youxuan de, ta bu rang renhe ren kuijian ta de youxuan,
72|27|chufei tasuo xiyue de shizhe, yinwei ta paiqian weidui, zai shizhe de qianmian he houmian xingzou,
72|28|yibian ta zhidao shizhe que yi chuandale tamen de zhu de shiming, bingqie zhouzhi tamen suoyou de yanxing, erqie tongji wanwu de shumu.”
